title: The development permissions granted under the provisions of Accommodation Reservation provisions and full & final occupation certificate is issued, in such cases the portion / location designated for respective reservation is continued to be in said reservation and restof land on which residential / commercial development permission is granted is deemed to be converted into residential / commercial zone to the extent of that area
clause_text: The development permissions granted under the provisions of Accommodation Reservation provisions and full & final occupation certificate is issued, in such cases the portion / location designated for respective reservation is continued to be in said reservation and restof land on which residential / commercial development permission is granted is deemed to be converted into residential / commercial zone to the extent of that area.
section: General conditions / notes to allow development under above regulations :-
